node.title: about_contents_0
node.description: SubNeural is a Space that enables the storage of neural output of Dionisis Pettas. It evolves with its creator, showcasing thought patterns about cyberphilosophy, existentialism & post-futurism.

node.title: about_contents_1
node.description: The zero-dimensional point of reference for this space is Curiosity. The rest is mathematics.
